body.name: Mini Handheld Fan, Portable Personal Fan Hanging Neck Fan 90° Adjustable USB Rechargeable 3000mAh Small Desk Fan 5 Speed for Home Office Travel (3000mAh, Navy Blue)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 5 hrs 31 mins
features: [Longer Working Time] 3000mah large capacity, support 7-12h working time with one full charge. Working time depends on different speeds: Speed 1 (12 hours); Speed 2(10 hours); Speed 3(9 hours), Speed 4(7 hours); Speed 5(7 hours).
[Digital Display] Designed with digital display, you can see the remaining power easily, avoid sudden power off. The usb rechargeable fan is foldable, support 90 degrees adjustment.

[Multifunction Fan] Handheld Fan /Neck Fan/ Desk Fan: The portable mini fan not only can be used as a handheld fan, but also can be used as hanging neck fan, with a detachable lanyard. In addition, it has a removeable base, can be used as a small desk fan on desk table.
[5 Speed Setting] 5 speed adjustable, short press the button to turn on the fan, and press repeatedly to adjust the wind speed or turn off the fan.
[Mini size] 7.4x3.5x1.8 inch/0.4lb, the mini personal fan makes it easy to put into bag, perfect for outdoor travel home office.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 5 speed setting, the 4th gear is maximum speed; the 5th gear is cycling mode, will automatically adjust the fan speed.Small mini fan, can be used as handheld fan /neck fan / desk fan.With digital display, can see the remaining power easily.Longer working time, one full charge, use it a whole day.90 degree foldable.
How to use the fan? Press the button to turn on the fan, and press repeatedly to adjust the wind speed or turn off the fan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars You Must Buy This!!!
reviews.reviewText: This fan kicks out some power. It was hot in the Dominican but having this was a saving grace. This item helped keep me cool and you could barely hear it. I recommended this to a friend. It is lightweight. Battery life is very strong. I suggest this fan for your next vacation or to keep on hand for a walk or day at the park.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Can't live without it!
reviews.reviewText: I take this everywhere with me - inside stores, in the house when I'm having hot flashes, theme parks, walks outside, and even while I'm sleeping! I can't sleep without noise so when I'm traveling I set this up next to my bed, it does have an auto shut off after 4(I think?) Hours. The battery lasts so long! I'm able to use it for an entire day at Disney at level 3 and it only gets down to about 70%, I purchased the more powerful battery model!One thing I will say is that when you're outside in the heat, it will blow hot air at you, and when you're inside you'll get cold air. Still, hot air is better than no air! Also, you have to hold it most of the time. When it's hanging on your neck it bounces around too much.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Doesn’t work well in extreme heat
reviews.reviewText: The fan blows well but I’ve noticed on those extremely hot days it’s very faint, Even on its high settings. I do like that it tell you how battery like it has.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very nice portable fan used while in Orlando on vacation. It’s definitely a different type of heat there.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BestBang for your Buck
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I am in love with this little fan! My boyfriend says Relax its just a fan, But I have others that did not perform this well. It works extremely well. It has five blades and the cover so I think that helps. I work in a warehouse and needed something to be able to cool down. It also can be worn as a necklace. Yes a little clunky but if your not bending up and down alot you will be fine. The battery 🔋 is great! Long hours. It also has a digital battery percentage reader so you will always know if it needs to be charged. It can be folded and it has a little extra stand. Its cute. I recommend for trips or work. And one last thing it comes with little discs so you can put your favorite essential oil on it. Necklace is a cool addition

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Broken After a day
reviews.reviewText: I purchased a personal fan that was marketed as portable and rechargeable, but unfortunately, it turned out to be a total waste of money. After just one day, the fan completely stopped charging, leaving me in frustration and wishing I had spent my money elsewhere.The fan had no obvious physical damages, but charging seemed to be the biggest issue. I tried using different cables and chargers, but still, the fan wouldn't revive.It's a shame since I genuinely needed a personal fan, and this particular one had high ratings.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great all around
reviews.reviewText: This fan was a savior in my hospital labor bag. I ended up having a longer than expected hospital stay while having my son and this fan worked perfectly. The stand sat on the rolling table and I was able to direct the airflow easily. The charge held for a really long time! I really liked being able to have it stationary or handheld. The only thing I would have liked would be a little bit larger of a base as it was a bit too heavy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Speed settings are great, portable, charge last for greater than 8 hours straight. Can carry easily in purse or backpack. I use at work all the time
